creator: apache.org@schildbach.de
text:
Output to System.out and System.err in a Listener (in my case a
HttpSessionListener) is not swallowed by swallowOutput=true (server.xml, Context
element).

Regards,

Andreas

swallowOutput is only provided for the Context itself.  Even that's an extra 
feature to help out some beginner or less capable developers.  Use a real 
logging system, or at least getServletContext().log.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
